member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.SwaggerUIOptionsExtensions.InjectStylesheet(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Injects additional CSS stylesheets into the index.html page
member.param: A path to the stylesheet - i.e. the link "href" attribute
The target media - i.e. the link "media" attribute

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.SwaggerUIOptionsExtensions.SwaggerEndpoint(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds Swagger JSON endpoints. Can be fully-qualified or relative to the UI page
member.param: Can be fully qualified or relative to the current host
The description that appears in the document selector drop-down

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.SwaggerUIOptionsExtensions.EnableDeepLinking(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions)
member.summary: Enables deep linking for tags and operations

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.SwaggerUIOptionsExtensions.DisplayOperationId(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions)
member.summary: Controls the display of operationId in operations list

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.SwaggerUIOptionsExtensions.DefaultModelsExpandDepth(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions,System.Int32)
member.summary: The default expansion depth for models (set to -1 completely hide the models)

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.SwaggerUIOptionsExtensions.DefaultModelExpandDepth(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions,System.Int32)
member.summary: The default expansion depth for the model on the model-example section

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.SwaggerUIOptionsExtensions.DefaultModelRendering(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ModelRendering)
member.summary: Controls how the model is shown when the API is first rendered. (The user can always switch the rendering for a given model by clicking the 'Model' and 'Example Value' links.)

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.SwaggerUIOptionsExtensions.DisplayRequestDuration(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions)
member.summary: Controls the display of the request duration (in milliseconds) for Try-It-Out requests

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.SwaggerUIOptionsExtensions.DocExpansion(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.DocExpansion)
member.summary: Controls the default expansion setting for the operations and tags. It can be 'List' (expands only the tags), 'Full' (expands the tags and operations) or 'None' (expands nothing)

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.SwaggerUIOptionsExtensions.EnableFilter(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions,System.String)
member.summary: Enables filtering. The top bar will show an edit box that you can use to filter the tagged operations that are shown. If an expression is provided it will be used and applied initially. Filtering is case sensitive matching the filter expression anywhere inside the tag

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.SwaggerUIOptionsExtensions.MaxDisplayedTags(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions,System.Int32)
member.summary: Limits the number of tagged operations displayed to at most this many. The default is to show all operations

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.SwaggerUIOptionsExtensions.ShowExtensions(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions)
member.summary: Controls the display of vendor extension (x-) fields and values for Operations, Parameters, and Schema

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.SwaggerUIOptionsExtensions.ValidatorUrl(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions,System.String)
member.summary: By default, Swagger-UI attempts to validate specs against swagger.io's online validator. You can use this parameter to set a different validator URL, for example for locally deployed validators (Validator Badge). Setting it to null will disable validation

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions.RoutePrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets a route prefix for accessing the swagger-ui

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions.IndexStream
member.summary: Gets or sets a Stream function for retrieving the swagger-ui page

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions.DocumentTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets a title for the swagger-ui page

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions.HeadContent
member.summary: Gets or sets additional content to place in the head of the swagger-ui page

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI3.SwaggerUIOptions.ConfigObject
member.summary: Gets the JavaScript config object, represented as JSON, that will be passed to the SwaggerUI
